chapters.title: Chapter 11: The Death of Adrin
chapters.info: Timolan, p. 189—Clan Chief of the Miagoma Aiel. When he was young as a chief, he tried to unite the clans and failed. Other chiefs thought he might be a little hesitant to follow a man who had succeeded in doing just that. He grates at Rand's arrogance. He vowed that if Rand abandoned the Aiel, the Miagoma would go back to the Three Fold Land—after he sees Rand al'Thor dead. Wise Ones have recently been sent to convince Timolan not to return to the Three-Fold Land.
